headline: Q4 Rundown: RTX (NYSE:RTX) Vs Other Defense Contractors Stocks
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how RTX (NYSE:RTX) and the rest of the defense contractors stocks fared in Q4.

headline: Palantir Technologies: Why I'm Buying Amid Global Isolation Fears (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Palantir's AI-driven security solutions thrive amidst rising defense budgets, leveraging a strategic moat for long-term revenue growth. See more on PLTR here.
